name: Euro Truck Simulator 2: Street Art Paint Jobs Pack
summary:
Freshen up your trucks with an original and modern livery. Introducing the Street Art Paint Jobs Pack, now available for all current truck models (except 8x4 chassis configurations) in Euro Truck Simulator 2 and to some of the ownable trailers as well!

These new unique and colorful designs have been hand-crafted by our talented artists and are, of course, coming with predefined color presets alongside a fully customizable color palette, giving you a wider array of options when customizing your truck and trailer in the upgrade shop.

This pack includes six marvelous paint schemes:

Truck Yeah!
Colour Leap
Lost for Words
Red Dragon
Wild
Play Worlds

All of these themes are applicable to any in-game truck except for 8x4 chassis configurations.
